name: Starry's recovery
description:
This game was created by me and my daughter for My First Game Jam (Jul '22).

The story

Starry is sick. She needs vitamins to recover. Her three loyal friends, Owlet, Pink and Dude, decide to go look for fruits. Owlet heads for the meadows, Pink decides to explore the Fairy Mountain and Dude, the toughest one, enters the scary Skull Cave.

Will they be able to survive the wandering monsters and collect enough fruits to heal their friend?
